#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cctype>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int tc;
    scanf("%d", &tc);
    while(tc--)
    {
         int n,m,w,c;
         scanf("%d %d %d %d", &n, &m, &w, &c);
         int m0 = m, w0 = w, c0 = c;
         while(n>=15 && m>=1 && w>=2 && c>=12)
         {
               n = n - 15;
               m = m - 1;
               w = w - 2;
               c = c - 12;
         }
         while(n > 0 && m > 0)
         {
                 if(m >= 1 && n>=1)
                 {
                      m--;
                      n--;
                 }
                 else
                     continue;
                 if(min(c,n) >= 4)
                 {
                      c= c-4;
                      n = n-4;
                 }
                 else if(c>0 && n >0)
                 {
                      int x = min(c,n);
                      c = c-x;
                      n = n-x;
                 }
                 if(w >= 1 && n>=1)
                 {
                      w--;
                      n--;
                 }
                 else
                     continue;
                 if(min(c,n) >= 4)
                 {
                      c= c-4;
                      n = n-4;
                 }
                 else if(c>0 && n >0)
                 {
                      int x = min(c,n);
                      c = c-x;
                      n = n-x;
                 }
                 if(w >= 1 && n>=1)
                 {
                      w--;
                      n--;
                 }
                 else
                     continue;
                 if(min(c,n) >= 4)
                 {
                      c= c-4;
                      n = n-4;
                 }
                 else if(c>0 && n >0)
                 {
                      int x = min(c,n);
                      c = c-x;
                      n = n-x;
                 }
                 
         }
         printf("%d %d %d\n", m0 - m, w0-w, c0-c);
    }
    return 0;
}
